name: x402-proxy-api-example
title: Weather API Proxy with x402 Payments
description: Wraps the free Open-Meteo weather API with x402 micropayments, adding in-memory caching, rate limiting, and intelligent enrichment (feels-like temperature, UV warnings, clothing suggestions).
author: 402claw

endpoints.description: Extended forecast (up to 16 days) with daily enrichment
